Summary: A blueish-green meteior type object went east bound at a very high rate of speed.It disapeared behind the mountains.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Cumberland
There were no other sightings in Cumberland on or around January 14th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on I 68 at mile 33 headed towards Cumberland,Md.I was taking to my daughter at the time when a extremly bright light came into my sight from over me.Looked like a meteor but was a greenish blue color.It was east bound and didnt make any type of moves other than striaght ahead.This was the first time I have seen anything like this.I left my phone # if you would like to call me.The reason that I had not wrote before was that I heard a man on the Coast to Coast show last night which sounded alot like mine,except he said that it had hit there.{please talk to them about that}PLEASE let me know if you find out anything.Thanks,Doug
